EmailTemplate.subject: Link to Primus Elite 875 / 885 Infographic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> AEROSPACE | PRIMUS ELITE DISPLAY UPGRADE Hello,
The Primus Elite® 875 / 885 Display Upgrade infographic you requested is now available for download.
Download Infographic <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Primus Elite 875-885 Displays Infographic.pdf]]>
For more information about Primus Elite visit AEROSPACE.HONEYWELL.COM/ELITE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/cockpit-systems/primus-elite]]>
